import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../' import { saveShippingAddress } from '../actions/cartActions' const ShippingScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart =useSelector(state => state.cart) const { shippingAddress} = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address, city, postalCode, country})) history.push('/payment') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)}> City setCity(e.target.value)}> Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)}> Country setCountry(e.target.value)}>
) } export default ShippingScreen
